Systems Marketing Inc August 2017 to Present Perform Security Control Assessments on assigned systems using Risk Management Framework Guidelines RMF to determine the correct implementation of controls Analyze information security policies procedures standards and guidelines using the National Institute of Standard and Technology NIST guidelines Review System Security Plans SSP to overview the systems to determine categorization and selected security controls according to FIPS 200 Collaborate with team members system owners and technical managers to conduct kick off meetings to review
